text: Nilo Floody Buxton was a modern pentathlete from Chile. Nilo competed at the 1948, 1952 and 1956 Summer Olympics. He was born on July 16, 1921 and died on July 2, 2013.Nilo Floody == References == Category:1921 births Category:2013 deaths Category:Olympians for Chile Category:Chilean modern pentathletes
title: Nilo Floody
